  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3642</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3642</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Galí: El verb: present d'indicatiu</string>
            <string language="en">Galí: Verbs: present indicative</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Galí: Verben: anwesender Indicative</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Galí : Verbes : indicative actuel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Galí: Verbos: indicative atual</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Galí: Verbi: indicative attuale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Galν: Ρήματα: παρών ενδεικτικός</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Activitats interactives adreçades a l'alumnat nouvingut. Inclouen la presentació i la pràctica de les formes del present d'indicatiu de verbs usuals en català, alhora que promouen la comprensió i l'expressió escrites.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive activities aimed at pupils who have recently moved to Catalonia. Presentation and practice of the present indicative forms of the most usual Catalan verbs, while promoting oral and written comprehension and expression.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió</string>
            <string language="en">comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">morfologia</string>
            <string language="en">morphology (linguistics)</string>
            <string language="es">morfología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">expressió escrita</string>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
            <string language="es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive Aktivitäten strebten Schüler an, 
die vor kurzem nach Katalonien umgezogen sind. Darstellung und 
Praxis der anwesenden hinweisenden Formulare der üblichsten 
katalanischen Verben, bei der Förderung des Mund- und schriftlichen 
Erfassens und des Ausdruckes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les activités interactives ont visé les 
élèves qui se sont récemment déplacés en Catalogne. 
Présentation et pratique des formes indicatives actuelles des 
verbes catalans les plus habituels, tout en favorisant la 
compréhension et l'expression orales et écrites.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As atividades interativas visaram os alunos que 
se têm movido recentemente para Catalonia. Apresentação e 
prática dos formulários indicativos atuais dos verbos catalan os 
mais usuais, ao promover a compreensão e a expressão orais e 
escritas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le attività interattive hanno puntato sugli 
allievi che recentemente si sono mossi in Catalogna. 
Presentazione e pratica delle forme indicative attuali dei verbi
catalan più usuali, mentre promuovendo comprensione ed espressione 
orali e scritte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικές δραστηριότητες που στοχεύουν στους μαθητές 
που έχουν κινηθεί πρόσφατα προς την Καταλωνία. Παρουσίαση 
και πρακτική των παρουσών ενδεικτικών μορφών των πιό 
συνηθισμένων καταλανικών ρημάτων, προωθώντας την προφορικές και 
γραπτές κατανόηση και την έκφραση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Morphologie (Linguistik)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">morphologie (linguistique)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">morfologia (lingüistica)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grammatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">morfologia (linguistica)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματική</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
